meanings.definition: A long, low sofa without a back or arms, typically placed against a wall.
meanings.sent1: The family gathered on the divans to watch TV together.
meanings.sent2: She found a comfortable spot on the divans in the living room.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat decided to nap on the divans, claiming it as her throne.
meanings.sent4: The divans in the waiting room seemed to whisper stories of the many visitors they had seen.
meanings.sent5: The divans, with their plush cushions, beckoned tired travelers to rest.
